page.title: 03Leisure Time at Cottesmore
page.content: I live in Zetland Square,just over the road is the play park where there are 10 swings.Six for the older children and 4 for the younger ones,there is a slide and a see-saw.Near my house is a small wood which has an old bomb shelter in it.In the woods there are lots of secret paths and hiding places.When you get out of the wood there is a farmer's field and caravan site where people put their caravans. At the end of the site there is a hill but it is not very big,it has lots of paths. At the front of Roberto's house there is some grass,we play football there with friends.There are some trees there,like the ones at the back of my house.They are fir trees and are very dark green.In the autumn we go blackberry picking near the caravan site and sometimes we find mushrooms.
